caption: Great staff and food

This place really saved me during the pandemic.  A year after moving to brooklyn, I didn't know they even existed until I happened upon a reddit thread listing bars that were doing takeout beer.  This was how I discovered the best beer bar ever.  A great rotating draft list, and an amazing can lineup.  I make sure to come here at least once a month to stock up on as many cans as i can carry.  Also, do not sleep on their buffalo wings, they are top notch.  They have a ramen night on thursday, but alas i have parent duties, but I would love to find time to try it one of these days
Great place to hang out with friends and catch up. Friendly service and whiskey is priced fairly.
a place u and ur friends can come hang out..great staff

This spot has remained open for their loyal customers. Great selection of seasonal and small batch beers, ciders and meads. Outdoor seating with heaters that actually work even in the middle of a polar vortex. Bar staff and owner really put the effort in. Thanks team!
Drinkable!
Great place to hang out. Very friendly place.
Great food & beer selection. I hadn't been here until during the pandemic, but can easily see how this was an awesome bar before & will be again after.
Great Burgers
Great local bar. Beer fridges in the back with tons of local can choices. Good outside seating setup for distancing.

Yummy drinks and friendly staff. Easy and laid back. Good bar food menu for those snack food nights.  Sitting outside on Atlantic is a little crazy, but once we can go back inside, will be a great place to hang.
Since  the pandemic  began  this  was one of the bars we wanted  to support  and they did not  disappoint.  The  service  was great,  the drinks  was excellent,  and the  food  was great  also.
The best frosè! Staff is super friendly. Patio is really cute and the food is delicious! Very safe and clean.

Nothing super special comes through via the outdoor dining setup unfortunately. This place really excelled vibe-wise indoors. I'll give this an extra star due to cheap drink options and birthday jello shots.
Exelent place. I like the tap beer and the food is amazing
Wonderful service and great food
The chicken tenders were great! Service here was good the wait wasn’t long.
This place is amazing! The food is amazing, service is fabulous and has a great outdoor dining space!
Wonderful service.  Great drinks and food.  Perfect Outdoor dining and drinks for everyone !

Christine was amazing! The drinks were refreshing and the food was good. Overall, if you want A1 service come enjoy a night in the outdoor seating area - hopefully you’re lucky enough to have the same waitress that we did. Thank you Christine!
Great service, super clean and delicious food. Can’t wait to come back for more!
Good outdoor seating. Staff was chill and super attentive.

My favorite neighborhood haunt ! If you are looking for an unpretentious place with a huge selection of drinks and great service, come to Someday. And they have great food to boot ! This place feels like home - much needed during these tough times.

Incredible drink selections and the vibes are chill! This is a neighborhood favorite... Staff is overly friendly and extremely attentive. The food is phenomenal and their sidewalk is impeccably clean for outdoor hangs! An all time favorite of mine and always a first choice for hangs.
Outside tables can give you splinters because they're unfinished. Drinks were cool though.
Megan the owner is great and wonderful food and drinks! Highly recommend!
A great spot to find the ‘dirt’ in Brooklyn. Innovative cocktails. Who can resist the “Boulevardier of Broken Dreams.
I knew the owner back when she was running the show at my favorite bar on the Les. She did a great job then and this place is even better.

This place is a winner. The vibe is cool but comfortable. The beer list is fantastic and varied across styles. The cocktails are great, and the food falls neatly into the craveable column. Don't sleep on the pierogis.
Great place to hang out.

Simply awesome.  Place was lively, the bartender was friendly knowledgeable.  And guess what?  She was also the owner!  Happy Hour was great with many choices, great value, great selection of craft beverages.  I will definitely be here again soon.  Great job!
Great place extremely friendly bartender owner.  The happy hour was easy to understand and great value.  Will be going again soon.
Huge selections of cans in a cooler, which you can pick and bring to the bar. What a great idea, more places should do that.

Great neighborhood spot with 20 rotating taps and a large selection of cans and bottles. Featuring a lot of local New York breweries as well as most of the American craft breweries you expect. If beer isn't your thing they also have craft ciders, wine and a full bar. Happy hour deals most days and frequently hosting beer related events.
Cool place. The food is good and they've got a good beer selection. Atmosphere is kind of a neighborhood bar with a hipster vibe which works well. It'd be a good regular stop

Beer selection is more than you could ever dream of. Food is out of this world and is extremely well crafted! From what it seems, one of the most talented chefs I have experienced. This bar/restaurant is a hidden gem. I hope everyone gets the opportunity to find it.
By far one of my favorite spots to meet with friends and new people.

Awesome new spot we discovered through our Pub Pass with an extensive draft list, a cooler of plenty of cans and bottles, and great happy hour deals until 8pm. Full food menu and generally a chill spot to spend a lot of time in. Loved the 90s playlist on a Friday night.  Looking forward to coming back!

I was in Brooklyn on business for a week and looking for a place to unwind after busy days in the office.  This place was a find.  It has an excellent selection of beers, good food, and none of the corporate vibe typical of other options in the area.  Turns out that the lady hustling all over the place, seeing to customers' every need, is the owner.  This place is her dream, and it shows if you look closely.  Very welcoming and warm.
Great vibe and staff was amazing.
Nice atmosphere but it was too cold no heat, bathroom was freezing.  The bartender was so nice and she is pretty But they need more variety on the menu
Great tap line and cans/bottles. Delicious food. Friendly and knowledgeable staff. Great space. Just all around excellent spot. You need to check out someday bar. Also great for parties!!
Awesome selection of craft beer and... They have both 'disco fries' and 'pierogies'.
Nice place good food lots of beer selections
Great beer selection. Also they played a ton of punk / pop punk and ska. Kind of has a cafe vibe. Very cozy
Fantastic bar with great food, cocktails, beers, and a killer can selection.
Great bar with friendly staff, delicious food, and always an awesome beer list.
Always a lovely time at someday bar!
Great staff, owner is a gem, other bar guests were super fun and engaging.
Great selection of beers. Amazing food
So many quality beer options and personable staff.
Really chill place to hang out and lovely staff!

Cool vibes and decor, suuper long beer list. I had one beer that was 8% ABV and was given an "8 oz." pour served as a half-full stem less wine glass. I've never seen beer poured in 8 oz. (except maybe some 12%+ beers), and I've definitely never seen a measured pour that isn't in an appropriately sized glass. It was delicious. It was also $8.50. Would come back, would definitely scrutinize the hand-written menu (pour sizes are not noted on the printed list). Would NOT spend more than $1 per ounce on a moderately alcoholic IPA. *disclaimer - this photo was taken after I had taken two small tasting sips.
Alrighy
Fantastic place and amazing people.
Casual vibe. Friendly bartender. Lots of beer and cocktail options.
perfect addition to the neighborhood! amazing happy hour, great food and an expansive beer selection with great cocktails too. also plenty of room and tables for any party size
A nice layout with a friendly bartender. The cocktails were creative along with a large beer selection the food look appetizing. I regret not trying their brunch.

Come for the food, the beer, the service or the ambiance, and you won't be disappointed. The only thing that stinks about this place is that eventually, you do need to leave :(  Large tap list with all the favorite styles, and the team here really knows their beer and cocktails. The food is sneaky good, too. It's just just bar food; you could really come here just to eat. A fairly new neighborhood gem that you'll want to make your new local hang.

There are a ton of beers on tap here and also quite a bit in the fridge. The food is excellent and I've been here multiple times already.  The bartenders know what they're serving, ask for a beer or whiskey selection and they'll try to steer you in the right direction. The ambiance is also very nice, an Alice in wonderland vibe. If I had any complaints and this is a stretch is I wish there was a tv hanging somewhere to watch the local sports team but this isn't the type of bar for that so I accept it.
Nice new bar with a really good beer menu and food way better than typical bar food
Great Atmosphere,  great staff , yummy food
Great beer selection and bar.
Amazing new restaurant,  fabulous wine, beer and food menu.
Great bar with amazing food: "Stinky" meat and cheese board; Bahn Mi and Burger all fantastic.  Warm staff.
Great beer list, super friendly staff, amazing food.  A new place but lots of experience behind it. Well worth a visit.
Just terrific.
Awesome beer selection, amazing food, chill atmosphere, and great bartenders! I highly recommend the burger, one of the best I've had in all of NYC.
This place is awesome. The Bahn mi is a must, one of the best sandwiches I've ever had. Lots of space, great food, great beer selection, and the staff is super friendly!
Super sweet staff and lovely space. Food is delicious!
Delicious food menu.. I tasted the fried ribs.. pierogi and banh mi...sooo good! Definitely coming back soon!
Loved it - Christine was great!! Tap list was incredible and food was wonderful. 5/5 would come again!

Great beer list --- it's about time this neighborhood got a legit craft beer bar.  Lots of options on draft and beer cans (found a Hudson Valley sour here!).  Will be returning for more (especially when the kitchen is up and running).
Solid beer served by a lovely staff. The bar itself is gorgeous and it's a prime location, accessible from multiple trains. Great addition to the neighborhood!
So happy to have a great bar on our block!!
Great bar!  Love the staff

Hidden gem in Boerum Hill! Love this bar, fabulous ambience with whimsical little touches throughout! Extensive drinks menu and great music! Very family friendly with plenty of space for our stroller!
Awesome little spot with a great beer list and great service, I will be coming back here again! Cheers
